ModMetaData.name: [M3] [Fork] Lord of the Rims - Orcs and Goblins [1.4 - 1.5]
ModMetaData.author: mupe3, WalkingProblem
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/F9Pv3pa.png[/img] Lord of the Rims - Orcs and Goblins adds Uruk, Orc, Goblin factions and equipment.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/9EUqtcn.png[/img] (content images wip)
[img]https://i.imgur.com/XzjgGHm.png[/img] Q: Is this safe to add or remove midgame? A: Yes its safe to add and should be safe to remove midgame.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/cEpnXyu.png[/img] continuation / fork of WalkingProblems mod https://github.com/Lord-of-the-Rims-DevTeam/Lord-of-the-Rims---Orcs-and-Goblins
[img]https://i.imgur.com/yoI0PuL.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] For best support, please use Discord for error-reporting. [/list]
